entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: ENE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
